name: Deaf Gramps (Indie Game Dev Beginners #002)
description:
Gramps remembers better times. What will trigger his memories?

Controls
  • Move: W/D or LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS
  • Interact: SPACE or UP ARROW KEY
  • Quit to main menu: ESC

This game was created for Indie Game Dev Beginners #002: Nostalgia.

This game was created using the Godot Engine. License information can be found at https://godotengine.org/license.
